NIPER Recruitment 2025 - Apply for 02 Project Research Scientist Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 17:04 IST
 National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 71,120 to 71,120




FOLLOW

National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research Ahmedabad (NIPER) has declared the latest job notification fr 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Project Research Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the NIPER Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the application form before the last date.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Gujarat.

NIPER Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	N.of Vacancies	Qualification
Project Research Scientist 	02	M.Sc., Ph.D

Age Limit for the NIPER Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the NIPER Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the NIPER Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 71,120 /- per month.

Application fee for the NIPER Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NIPER Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Project Research Scientist Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form along with the relevant documents to the email address given below.

Email address

bichismita@niperahm.res.in

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	15-08-2025
Last Date of Application	31-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
